description:
[https://docs.sentry.io/api/events/list-an-issues-events/](https://docs.sentry.io/api/events/list-an-issues-events/)

This endpoint lists an issue's events.

### Path Parameters

`issue_id` *(string)*REQUIRED

The ID of the issue to retrieve.

### Query Parameters:

`full` *(boolean)*

If this is set to true then the event payload will include the full event body, including the stacktrace. Set to true to enable.

### Scopes

You need to [authenticate via bearer auth token.](https://docs.sentry.io/api/auth) requires one of the following scopes:

*   `event:read`
